definition: defense against poison/defense against poison gas/anti-narcotics measures/defense against computer viruses
to protect/to defend/to guard against/to prevent

sentences.english: Smoke escape emergency respirator masks are available in a wide variety of prices and weights.
sentences.chinese: 可以买到很多种价钱和重量的紧急防毒面具。

sentences.english: Just like Antivirus software, it needs to be updated all the time.
sentences.chinese: 就像防毒软件，它需要更新全部时间。

sentences.english: Together, it is the most award-winning combined antivirus and antispyware on the market today.
sentences.chinese: 一起，这是最屡获殊荣的市场整合防毒和反间谍今天。

sentences.english: But he also liked wearing a gas mask while doing so.
sentences.chinese: 但他也喜欢骑车的同时带一个防毒面具。

sentences.english: I asked Tim to install an antivirus software program on my computer.
sentences.chinese: 我要求提姆帮我计算机安装一套防毒软件。

sentences.english: This gas mask can immunize you against poison gas.
sentences.chinese: 防毒面具能使你免遭毒气袭击。

sentences.english: He kept out deadly fumes wearing his own gas mask and sucked water from a lava tube.
sentences.chinese: 他带着防毒面具将浓烟雾挡住，从熔岩管中吸水喝。

sentences.english: The page you are visiting has been rejected by antivirus gateway, for it is a virus file.
sentences.chinese: 您访问的页面存在病毒，已被防毒墙阻断。

sentences.english: By now, you know to have antivirus software installed on your PC.
sentences.chinese: 现在，你知道你有安装防毒软件PC机。

sentences.english: A very good free Anti-Virus Software.
If only someone could now miniaturise gas masks.
sentences.chinese: 哈，现在就差有谁能够搞个微缩版防毒面具出来。

sentences.english: I want a free avg antivirus for personal computer.
sentences.chinese: 我想免费防毒平均为个人电脑。

sentences.english: Otherwise, but wearing gas masks, light drinking distilled water.
sentences.chinese: 否则，只好头戴防毒面具，光喝蒸馏水了。

sentences.english: Shortages of antivenom medicines, the treatment for snakebite, are common there.
sentences.chinese: 治疗蛇咬的防毒药品短缺在那里很普遍。

sentences.english: Be mobilized anti-drug antivirus first-rate civilized city.
sentences.chinese: 全民动员禁毒防毒创一流文明城市。

definition: poison gas/toxic gas/manifestation of passion, anger etc (Buddhism)
to detoxify/to relieve fever (in Chinese medicine)
a poison/a toxic agent/poison gas/a chemical weapon
to defend against the cold/to keep warm
to protect from wind/fangfeng (Saposhnikovia divaricata), its root used in TCM
